sentences.en: Businesses are investing millions of dollars to gain a foothold in this new market.
sentences.cn: 商家们正投资数百万美元以求在新市场中赢得立足点。

sentences.en: Climbers can strap sharp nails on to help get a foothold on a slippery slope.
sentences.cn: 登山运动员可以在靴子上捆上尖钉,这样有助于在很滑的陡坡上站住脚.

sentences.en: Enterprises can foothold in the market, pricing strategy plays a key role.
sentences.cn: 企业能否在市场上立足, 定价策略起着关键性的作用.

sentences.en: He lowered his legs until he felt he had a solid foothold on the rockface beneath him.
sentences.cn: 他把腿向下伸，直到他感觉稳稳地踩住下面的石头。

sentences.en: I could give some other company a foothold in my market.
sentences.cn: 我好让别的公司跑到我的市场这站稳脚跟.

sentences.en: I have no idea about your foothold by doing so.
sentences.cn: 我不知道你这样做的落脚点是什么.

sentences.en: I hung there, scrabbling with my feet to find a foothold.
sentences.cn: 我吊在那儿，两脚乱蹬着寻找落脚点。

sentences.en: It isn't easy to get a foothold as an actor.
sentences.cn: 演员要得到巩固的地位不容易.

sentences.en: It'll give us a foothold in that market.
sentences.cn: 这样我们在那个市场会有立足点了.

sentences.en: Overall, the technology stocks have begun to gain a firm foothold.
sentences.cn: 整体而言, 科技股已经开始站稳脚跟.

sentences.en: Somehow It'seems to be agreeable and first loosens its foothold.
sentences.cn: 他开始似乎并不准备威胁对方.

sentences.en: The banks have spent years a foothold in the Chinese market.
sentences.cn: 这些外资银行为了立足于中国市场已做出多年努力.

sentences.en: The company is eager to gain a foothold in Europe.
sentences.cn: 这家公司急于在欧洲取得一席之地。

sentences.en: The management is standard, It takes Shandong as foothold, face nation.
sentences.cn: 经营管理规范, 以山东为立足点, 面向全国.

sentences.en: They do not want feather - bedding, they want a foothold.
sentences.cn: 他们不想要鹅毛枕头, 只想要个立足之处.

words.tran_cn: 基础；立足处；社会关系；合计
步行；在…上行走；总计（foot的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 立足处（攀登时脚踩的地方），（在事业等方面可以进一步发展的）稳固地位，据点
trans.tran_en: a position from which you can start to make progress and achieve your aims
